name: JENNY LOVBLOM
sampleDescriptions: Engagement in connection with advocacy for individual client to receive appropriate Sudan Claims Resolution Act funds
Lobbying for Jenny Lovblom, a victim of the US Embassy bombings, to obtain appropriate relief under the US Sudan Claims Resolution Act.
